SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerDAOImpl
public interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
Interface for Customer DAO operations in FlipFit gym booking system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean

  • Method Details

    • getAllGymsByArea

      List<FlipFitGym> getAllGymsByArea()
      Retrieves all gyms from the database filtered by area.
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitGym objects representing gyms in the area.

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int gymId, int time, String email)
      Books a slot in a gym for a user.
      Parameters:
      gymId - ID of the gym where the slot is booked.
      time - Time slot to book.
      email - Email of the user booking the slot.
      Returns:
      true if booking is successful, false otherwise.

    • getAllBookingByUserID

      List<FlipFitBookings> getAllBookingByUserID(String userId)
      Retrieves all bookings made by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user whose bookings are retrieved.
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitBookings representing bookings made by the user.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(int bookingId)
      Cancels a booking based on booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - ID of the booking to cancel.
      Returns:
      true if cancellation is successful, false otherwise.

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String username, String pass)
      Validates user credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - Username (email) of the user.
      pass - Password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise.

    • createUser

      void createUser(FlipFitUser flipFitUser)
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      flipFitUser - FlipFitUser object containing user details.
